column4: N Limestone between Barr St and Mechanic St
column5: Right lane blocked due to necessary construction.  Traffic impact is minimal, but use added caution.

column3: Notice Regarding Traffic Signal Timing on Side Streets:
column4: Please be patient at signalized intersections.

column3: Notice Regarding Traffic Signal Timing on Side Streets:
column4: Traffic signals are timed for much higher traffic volumes than our streets are currently experiencing.

column3: Notice Regarding Traffic Signal Timing on Side Streets:
column4: Although waits on side streets may seem long, once the main streets are accessed, travel should be faster with much less delays than under normal conditions.
